subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which famous fort is located in Jodhpur?
question_hi: जोधपुर में कौन सी मंगल है?
D_hi: राजस्थान स्कूल में कौन सी काम करती है?
explanation_en: The Kanak Bhawan is not a fort, it is a palace built by Rao Jodha to accommodate guests.
